text.content: Getting into college is difficult for many students.
Now, good grades are not enough.
Students need good grades in advanced subjects.
Extracurricular activities include sports, dance, and music.
They prefer students who are club presidents or team captains.
Students also need high scores on exams.
Exams test knowledge in different subjects.
Teachers and principals write recommendation letters.
These letters describe the studentâ€™s personality and skills.
Essays help colleges understand students better.
If a student has great grades but a boring essay, they may not get in.
